climbs.name: Where The Banshees Lie - PERMANENTLY CLOSED TO CLIMBING!!

content.description: The crux is getting out of the chimney about 60' up.  Good rock, but a little rough on the hands.  Nice line.
content.location: Left line in photo, this route is the left of two obvious vertical crack systems in the wall.

climbs.name: Pipes of Pan - PERMANENTLY CLOSED TO CLIMBING!!

content.description: All natural line with some surprises.  The crux is a very interesting and unexpected move at the short left jog indicated in the photo at about 40% up the route. The first pitch ends about 20' after the short jog.  Many potential lines, all easy (5.5 to 5.7) to the summit.  Photo shown with 'Where the Banshees lie'.
content.protection: Bring some small stuff.  Wires and small aliens protect the crux.
content.location: The route follows a crack system above a large pod on the right side of the wall.
